about_the_game:
Become a force of nature

Before the storm hit, Breeze was just an ordinary dog living an ordinary life with his best friend, Diana. But all that changed one night when freak winds ravaged the town, awakening long-dormant powers within the unsuspecting pup!

Suddenly Breeze finds himself whisked away to Tropolis—a strange world in disarray, where weather is controlled and maintained by a squabbling bureaucracy of natural forces from across the animal kingdom. If he wants to find his way back to Diana, Breeze must harness his newfound abilities, master the elements, and fight the forces of pollution threatening to destroy the world.

                                                  Breezy Brawling Adventure 

Take control of a clever, scrappy, and courageous corgi, and embark on a fast and fluid 2D action-packed adventure. Master the abilities of Wind, Cloud, and more, as you battle against foes in dynamic, combat-heavy sequences. Use the elements to your advantage, unleashing devastating attacks with lightning-fast combos, ferocious finishers, and elemental transformations that bring new tactics to the fight.

                                               Battle The Elements - No, Really! 

Breeze will venture through diverse weather domains ruled by the fiercest natural forces: icy wolves, watergun-slinging platypuses, and sulfur-spitting hyenas. There are over a dozen bosses, each presenting a unique challenge that tests both Breeze’s combat skills and his ability to adapt to their weather-based powers.

                                                           Who’s a Good Boy? 

Join Breeze in uncovering the mystery behind Tropolis' turmoil, take down the corrupt forces controlling the weather, and teach the inhabitants that only by working together can they save their world from destruction. Summon support characters to help you in combat and change the weather in your favor. Converse with a big, colorful cast to gather knowledge, solve problems, and earn items.

                                                     Hip, Smooth, Breezy Groove 

Explore the clouds to the tune of a soundtrack filled with jazz, new jack, swing, samba, and more nostalgic sounds—crafted by musicians with a love for classic genres and the world of video game music.

Breeze in the Clouds is crafted by a team of animation-loving, video-game-enamored artists, designers, and developers from around the world. In bringing Breeze to life, the team worked with a meteorologist to bring elements of real-world weather into the gameplay.

name: Breeze in the Clouds
short_description: Jump, brawl, and command the powers of weather as Breeze, a scrappy corgi swept into a world in the clouds where animal forces control the weather. Battle the elements with combo-fueled 2D brawling action as you accumulate the ultimate puppy power!
